mainWindow

Class MainWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainWindow.MainWindowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MainWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller for MainWindow of operations after login screen.

    • Method Detail

      • searchButtonPressed

        public void searchButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.sql.SQLException
        Function to run if a student ID, or an ISBN is entered in the search box. It will get the data from the search box, and if a match is found in the data base, it will display the information to the mainWindow tableView. If not data matched the query, the program will display an alert saying so.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that trigger this function.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If bad data was entered.
        java.sql.SQLException - If connection to data base failed.

      • logoutUser

        public void logoutUser(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Handles logout request, and return the user to the login screen.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that trigger this function.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the fxml was not found.

      • viewButtonPressed

        public void viewButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.sql.SQLException
        Process the action when the View button is pressed. Shows all students or books.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that triggered this function.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a file cannot be loaded.
        java.sql.SQLException - If the connection to the data base failed.

      • newStudentButton

        public void newStudentButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.sql.SQLException
        Process new student record. It makes sure fields are not empty. Also, it displays an alert window whether the operation succeed or failed.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that triggered this function.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file cannot be loaded.
        java.sql.SQLException - If the connection to the data base failed.
